title: 4 man premade gas-lighting
body:
So after about a 2 month break i came back to check out TFT

Lastnight i decided to queue for a normal game solo - Was placed in a 4man premade (i could tell because they all had same clan tag) 
Our cassiopeia jungle was an obnoxious in allchat to the enemy / myself. 
i said not 1 thing at this point. just pinging mia and farming. 
He decided to come smite my large cannons (mid lane) and farm the lane while i was in it. 
I decided rather than be toxic and get into a losing argument with the premade i went AFK 

Welp. I have a 10 game chat restriction and lost my honour. 
Just wanted to applaud you on such a good automated punishment system.

Edit: i see you chat log bellow im going to be 50/50 with you if you didnt cut out the toxic part of the chat you got a restriction for saying "dogbrain" but thats your summoner name but the system doesn't know that and telling someone to shit the fuck up is negative and shouldnt be bannable i would open a support ticket and ask them about it bus tmajority of the time riot just spit in your face call you toxic and say you deserved it because they're snowflakes

If you were punished, it was for your actions and not theirs. If you want a review of the punishment then you can post your chat logs.

Just because you were punished, doesn't mean they weren't, or that your report won't be used against them in future judgements.
